
### why reorder here? 


:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}
 
```gnuassembler
thread_A:
    movl $1, x   /* x <- 1 */
    movl y, %eax /* return y */
    ret

```
 
:::

::: {.column width="45%"}
 
```gnuassembler
thread_B:
    movl $1, y   /* y <- 1 */
    movl x, %eax /* return x */
    ret

```
 
:::

::::


* thread A: faster to load <code>y</code> right now!
* â€¦ rather than wait for write of <code>x</code> to finish
